description.en: Alpaca Finance is the first leveraged yield farming protocol on Binance Smart Chain. We are a fair launch project with no pre-sale, no investor, and no pre-mine. Our protocol will allow user to open a leveraged yield farming position by borrowing from our deposit vaults.
